title: COVID origin: US spy agencies publish 'inconclusive' report

title: Sri Lanka Opens For Indian Travellers Once Again
snippet: After a long-anticipated hiatus, Sri Lanka has opened its borders to India. Fully vaccinated Indian travellers will be required to produce a negative PCR report issued not before 72 hours
